reactor.test

类 MemoryUtils.RetainedDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.test.MemoryUtils.RetainedDetector
  • 封闭类:
    MemoryUtils

    public static final class MemoryUtils.RetainedDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class to check that some tracked object are finalized, by way of tracking them through a PhantomReference.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      RetainedDetector() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void assertAllFinalized()
      Assert that all tracked elements have been finalized.
      long finalizedCount()
      Returns the number of tracked objects that have been finalized.
      <T> T tracked(T object)
      Track the object in this MemoryUtils.RetainedDetector's ReferenceQueue
      long trackedTotal() 

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • RetainedDetector

        public RetainedDetector()

    • 方法详细资料

      • tracked

        public final <T> T tracked(T object)
        Track the object in this MemoryUtils.RetainedDetector's ReferenceQueue
        类型参数:
        T - the type of the object
        参数:
        object - the object to track
        返回:
        the tracked object for further use

      • finalizedCount

        public final long finalizedCount()
        Returns the number of tracked objects that have been finalized.
        返回:
        the number of tracked object that have been finalized.

      • trackedTotal

        public final long trackedTotal()
        返回:
        the total number of objects that have been added to this MemoryUtils.RetainedDetector

      • assertAllFinalized

        public final void assertAllFinalized()
        Assert that all tracked elements have been finalized.
        抛出:
        java.lang.AssertionError - if some tracked elements have not been finalized
